title: Build AXOPAY Digital Wallet Platform with Referral & Binary Reward System

requirements.text: Create public website landing page with hero section displaying headline 'Borderless Payments. Limitless Possibilities.', subtext 'Modern digital finance platform for global transactions', Get Started and Login buttons, and visual elements representing secure shield and digital network

requirements.text: Implement client authentication system with login form accepting email/username and password, OTP verification step, and forgot password functionality

quotes: Client Access: Login fields: Email / Username, Password, OTP verification, Forgot password

acceptanceCriteria: Login form accepts both email and username
OTP verification is required after password entry
Forgot password flow allows password reset
Backend validates credentials and generates OTP

requirements.text: Implement client sign-up system collecting name, email, phone, password, country, and optional referral ID, with backend actions to create wallet, generate unique user ID, link sponsor, and verify via OTP

quotes: Sign-up: Registration data: Name • Email • Phone • Password • Country • Referral ID (optional) System actions: Create wallet • Generate user ID • Link sponsor • Verify via OTP

acceptanceCriteria: Registration form collects all required fields
Referral ID field is optional
Backend creates wallet with initial balance structure (Main, Earnings, Withdrawal)
Unique user ID is generated and stored
Referral link to sponsor is established if referral ID provided
OTP is sent and verified before account activation

requirements.text: Implement separate admin authentication portal with login form accepting admin ID and password, mandatory 2FA verification, and optional IP restriction enforcement

quotes: Admin Access: Separate secure portal: Admin ID, Password, Mandatory 2FA, Optional IP restriction

acceptanceCriteria: Admin login is on a separate route from client login
Admin ID and password are required
2FA is enforced for all admin logins
IP restriction can be configured and enforced per admin account

requirements.text: Create client dashboard main overview displaying wallet balance, active plan, ROI progress, total earnings, referral income, binary income, withdrawable balance, team size, and recent transactions

quotes: Main Overview: Wallet balance • Active plan • ROI progress • Total earnings Referral income • Binary income • Withdrawable balance Team size • Recent transactions

acceptanceCriteria: All metrics are displayed on the dashboard
Data is fetched from backend and updated in real-time
Recent transactions show at least the last 5-10 entries

requirements.text: Implement wallet features allowing users to deposit funds, withdraw funds, perform internal transfers between users, convert currencies, and view transaction history, with three wallet types: Main, Earnings, and Withdrawal

quotes: Wallet Features: Deposit funds • Withdraw funds • Internal transfer Currency conversion • Transaction history Recommended wallet types: Main • Earnings • Withdrawal

acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate deposits with external gateway integration placeholder
Withdrawal requests are created and pending admin approval
Internal transfers move funds between user accounts instantly
Currency conversion uses configured exchange rates
Transaction history shows all wallet activity with filters
Three distinct wallet balances (Main, Earnings, Withdrawal) are maintained and displayed

requirements.text: Implement plan management system allowing users to purchase or upgrade investment plans (BEGIN $100, GROW $300, PEAK $500), view ROI tracker showing daily returns progress, display plan expiry date, and provide repurchase option

quotes: Plan Management: Purchase or upgrade plan • ROI tracker • Plan expiry view • Repurchase option

acceptanceCriteria: Users can select and purchase from the three plan tiers
ROI tracker shows accumulated returns and remaining days
Plan expiry date is clearly displayed
Repurchase button is enabled when plan expires or is near expiry
Backend deducts plan cost from Main wallet and activates the plan

requirements.text: Implement ROI engine that automatically calculates and credits daily returns based on plan percentage (5% daily example) until plan expiry (30 days), crediting earnings to the Earnings wallet

quotes: ROI Engine: Automated daily returns until plan expiry
Example: 5% daily × 30 days

acceptanceCriteria: Backend scheduler runs daily to process ROI for active plans
Daily percentage is configurable per plan
Returns are credited to Earnings wallet
Plan expires after configured duration
ROI history is logged for audit

requirements.text: Implement referral module displaying personal referral link with user's referral ID, downline list showing directly referred users, team tree visualization with hierarchical structure, and referral earnings summary

quotes: Referral Module: Personal referral link • Downline list • Team tree visualization • Referral earnings

acceptanceCriteria: Referral link includes user's unique referral ID
Link is copyable and shareable
Downline list shows all direct referrals with join date and status
Team tree visualizes multi-level referral hierarchy
Referral earnings display total earned from direct referrals (10% bonus)

requirements.text: Implement binary system with left and right team structure, pair matching logic that calculates matching volume, daily payout limits, binary income tracking, and volume carry-forward for unmatched volume

quotes: Binary System: Left & right team structure • Pair matching • Daily limits Binary income • Volume carry-forward

acceptanceCriteria: Each user has left and right leg placement in binary tree
New referrals are assigned to weaker leg or next available position
Pair matching engine calculates matched volume daily
Binary income is credited based on matched pairs (amount per plan tier)
Daily limits prevent excessive payouts
Unmatched volume carries forward to next day
Frontend displays left/right team size and volumes

requirements.text: Implement binary matching engine that matches left and right leg volumes, applies daily payout limits, credits binary earnings based on plan tier ($10 for BEGIN, $30 for GROW, $50 for PEAK per pair), and carries forward unmatched volume

quotes: Binary Matching Engine: Matches left/right volumes, applies limits, credits earnings
Pair income: $10 / $30 / $50

acceptanceCriteria: Engine runs daily or on-demand
Calculates smaller of left/right volume as matched pairs
Credits appropriate pair income to Earnings wallet
Enforces configured daily limit
Excess volume rolls over to next period
Logs all matching calculations

requirements.text: Implement rewards section displaying milestone rewards with progress indicators showing advancement toward goals, and claimed rewards history

quotes: Rewards Section: Milestone rewards • Progress indicators • Claimed rewards history

acceptanceCriteria: Milestones are displayed with target criteria and reward amounts
Progress bars or indicators show current advancement
Users can claim rewards when milestones are achieved

Backend validates milestone completion before payout

requirements.text: Implement reward engine that triggers payouts automatically when users achieve defined milestones (team size, volume, earnings thresholds), crediting rewards to Earnings wallet

quotes: Reward Engine: Triggers payouts when milestones are achieved

acceptanceCriteria: Engine monitors milestone criteria continuously
Automatically credits rewards when milestones are met
Prevents duplicate payouts for the same milestone
Logs all milestone achievements and payouts

requirements.text: Implement earnings and transactions section displaying income categorized by type (ROI, Referral, Binary, Rewards) with filters for date range, transaction type, and status

quotes: Earnings & Transactions: Income categories: ROI • Referral • Binary • Rewards Filters: Date • Type • Status

requirements.text: Implement security features including strong password hashing using industry-standard algorithms, withdrawal verification requiring OTP or 2FA, fraud monitoring for suspicious activity patterns, admin activity logging, rate limiting on sensitive endpoints, and automated backup systems

quotes: SECURITY FEATURES: HTTPS encryption • Strong password hashing • 2FA Withdrawal verification • Fraud monitoring Admin activity logs • Rate limiting • Backup systems

acceptanceCriteria: Passwords are hashed with salt before storage
Withdrawal requests trigger OTP verification
Backend monitors for unusual transaction patterns
All admin actions are logged with timestamp and admin ID
Rate limiting prevents brute force attacks on login
Backup mechanism ensures data recovery capability

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual design system to the entire platform with a professional, modern aesthetic suitable for financial services, using a distinctive color palette (avoiding blue and purple unless specified), consistent typography, and layout patterns that reinforce trust and clarity throughout the public website, client dashboard, and admin panel
acceptanceCriteria: A unified color palette is applied across all pages
Typography choices enhance readability and hierarchy
Layout patterns are consistent and professional
Design conveys trust, security, and modernity
Visual style is distinct and not generic blue/purple

constraints: Use Motoko for all backend logic in a single main actor
Use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend
Do not modify read-only UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
Do not integrate external payment gateways; implement placeholder deposit/withdrawal flows
Do not implement real-time WebSocket features; use polling for live updates
Do not implement SMS or email sending; simulate OTP and email notifications
Do not implement KYC verification backend; accept document uploads to placeholder storage
nonGoals: Automated KYC verification with third-party services
Merchant payment APIs for external businesses
